str2: If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To build upon (above) a foundation. From epi and oikodomeo; to build upon, i.e. to rear up.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To remain, abide, stay, wait; with acc: I wait for, await. A primary verb; to stay.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I receive, get, (b) I take, lay hold of.
(a) pay, wages, salary, (b) reward, recompense, punishment. Apparently a primary word; pay for service, good or bad.
